profile.S2RPhK: I'm Jason, aka @vmx2f, I craft clean, functional, and visually bold interactive experiences, blending design and code to let real-world tools shape digital spaces.

title.QDsuFs: Amoled Dark Theme for Arch Linux with Hyprland
title.fq3pxd: Lively Captions - Real-time Translation and Subtitles for Desktop
title.5Bub3G: Minimal Script for Windows Terminal Configuration

description.D7qQDi: An elegant collection of dotfiles created for Arch Linux, my love letter to AMOLED aesthetics.
description.EUj8Mh: Lively Captions is a desktop application for real-time voice transcription and translation built with Python. It captures your voice via microphone or computer audio, transcribes it using Whisper, and also translates it to other languages.
description.7p6Ao9: A student report management application developed for Android and web.
description.jSvGWF: A minimalist PowerShell script to configure Windows Terminal with a custom theme, font, and settings.
description.DhYUIL: A small game demo made in Godot in collaboration with StraGeo Studios for Brackeys GameJam 2025 - 1.
description.8JTau4: A simple application to search for movies using the TMDB API.
description.rx3IvR: A minimalist and opinionated daily task organization application made in Java.
description.Cqrajh: A demo map application to mark dangerous areas based on reliable sources.

metadata.+BhY5h: This is my small space on the internet, enjoy your stay! ^^
